item.title: Saudi Arabia Warns of Economic Fallout if Congress Passes 9/11 Bill
item.description:
Saudi Arabia Warns of Economic Fallout if Congress Passes 9/11 Bill

A spokesman for the Saudi embassy did not return a message seeking comment. Saudi officials have long denied that the kingdom had any role in the Sept.11 plot, and the 9/11 Commission found "no evidence that the Saudi government as an institution or senior Saudi officials individually funded the organization."

item.title: Instacoin Installs 20th Bitcoin ATM In Canada
item.description:
Instacoin Installs 20th Bitcoin ATM In Canada

Instacoin continues their hot streaks when it comes to installing new Bitcoin ATMs throughout Canada. This brings their total to 20, giving them a significant presence in the world of ATM operators. It will be interesting to see if this trend continues at this pace over the coming months.

item.title: South African Startup to Fight Movie Piracy using Bitcoin
item.description:
South African Startup to Fight Movie Piracy using Bitcoin

It comes as little to no surprise to find out Digital Currency Group has taken an interest in this project, and were part of the company's second round seed investment. Bitcoin and digital currency offer many different use cases, although a lot of them still have to be discovered and explored.

item.title: Plutus & PlutusDEX - Complete End-To-End Decentralized Bitcoin Payments - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Plutus & PlutusDEX - Complete End-To-End Decentralized Bitcoin Payments - NEWSBTC

PlutusDEX dapp ensure complete decentralization of bitcoin-powered contactless payments through Plutus platform. Read more... Bitcoin and blockchain technology has changed the face of online end electronic payment systems. The use of blockchain technology, combined with crypto-tokens is not an alternative payment option anymore.

item.title: pH Miners Inc.'s New Deal Offers $3,000 Savings on Bitcoin and Litecoin Miners
item.description:
pH Miners Inc.'s New Deal Offers $3,000 Savings on Bitcoin and Litecoin Miners

The new offer allows customers to mix and match units according to their preference in Bitcoins or Litecoins. For example, if a customer would like two Bitcoin miners and one Litecoin miner, they will still qualify for the special offer and will be able to choose either a Bitcoin or Litecoin miner as their fourth free unit.

item.title: Bitcoin Core 0.12.1 Released, Major Step Forward for Scalability
item.description:
Bitcoin Core 0.12.1 Released, Major Step Forward for Scalability

Bitcoin Core 0.12.1 was released early this morning and the update includes several changes that have huge implications for Bitcoin scalability. The release deploys the first soft fork on the Bitcoin network to use the methodology outlined in BIP 9 (Version Bits), which allows multiple soft forks to take place at the same time.

item.title: Viet Film Fest Included Bitcoin Heist After-party
item.description:
Viet Film Fest Included Bitcoin Heist After-party

It looks as if the Bitcoin Heist movie will be making its way to the Western world after all. A recent trailer has surfaced regarding the upcoming Viet Film Fest 2016 in California, and the Bitcoin Heist movie will be the opener for this event.

item.title: Coincheck collects bitcoin donations for Kumamoto earthquake victims
item.description:
Coincheck collects bitcoin donations for Kumamoto earthquake victims

On April 15, at 16:25 UTC a magnitude 7.0 (M7.0) earthquake struck southwest Japan, "as the result of strike-slip faulting at shallow depth," according to the United States Geological Survey (USGS). The Japan Meteorological Agency recorded the quake as magnitude 7.1, which it later revised to 7.3.

item.title: Seniors-Scamming Conman Dealing in Bitcoin Sentenced to Prison
item.description:
Seniors-Scamming Conman Dealing in Bitcoin Sentenced to Prison

A man who admitted collecting more than $800,000 from seniors he tricked into sending virtual money orders to help distressed relatives has been sentenced to four and a half years in prison, according to the Florida Sun Sentinel. The man converted the virtual money orders from some of his victims into bitcoin.
